title: He complained his handcuffs were too tight. Then he stole the police officer’s car, officials say
text: He had initially been arrested around 7:15 that morning after officers responded to an assault call and found a woman with bruises on her face, police said. He was being transported to the Upper Marlboro Department of Corrections from the Hyattsville location when he complained his handcuffs were too tight and had them readjusted.
meta_description: A man being arrested for domestic assault managed to slip his handcuffs to the front of his body, hop into the driver's seat of a Maryland police officer's cruiser and drive away, Prince George's County police said.
